title: Crypto Wallet Security
longDescription: Your cryptocurrency wallets are prime targets for hackers. These measures will help you keep your assets safe.

items.title: Hardware wallet
items.description: Use a hardware wallet for cold storage
items.details: Store significant cryptocurrency holdings in a hardware wallet like Ledger or Trezor rather than keeping them on exchanges.

items.title: Seed phrase backup
items.description: Create secure backups of wallet seed phrases
items.details: Store your seed phrases securely, ideally in multiple physical locations. Consider using metal backup devices that are resistant to fire and water damage.

items.title: Multiple wallets
items.description: Use different wallets for different purposes
items.details: Maintain separate wallets for trading, long-term storage, and daily transactions to minimize risk exposure.
